DOC.brief_summary: This trial compare effectiveness Docetaxel without Carboplatin second line chemotherapy patient Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer , treat previously Docetaxel .
DOC.brief_title: Docetaxel Carboplatin Versus Docetaxel Second Line Treatment Patients With Non-Small-Cell Lung Carcinoma ( NSCLC )
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically confirm NSCLC . ECOG Performance Status 02 . No previous treatment Docetaxel . Measurable Disease . Brain metastasis treat radiotherapy stable asymptomatic . Adequate liver kidney bone marrow function . Patients must able understand nature study give write informed consent . Active cardiac disease : unstable angina onset angina within last 3 month , myocardial infarction within 6 month , congestive heart failure > class II , cardiac ventricular arrhythmia require antiarrhythmic therapy . Women pregnant lactating . Unknown HIV , chronic hepatitis B chronic hepatitis C infection . Serious neurologic psychiatric disease . Second primary malignancy within past 5 year , except nonmelanomas skin cancer situ carcinoma cervix . Active uncontrolled infection .
